record.title: ORDERS FOR FRIDAY, MARCH 7, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR FRIDAY, MARCH 7, 2008 -- (Senate - March 06, 2008)

[Page: S1718]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 10 a.m. tomorrow, Friday, March 7; that following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, the time of the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and that the Senate proceed to a period of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
